I just had a thought go thru my head ( Oh shit ).What would happen if you =
put a voice recorder in a
Faraday Cage, and have a session with a ghost box=
.... The Faraday Cage isn't supposed to pick up radio
interference right ? =
Would it pick up the other voices or not ? I know the entities are talking =
thru the radio
but has anyone ever tried it ? Stupid question huh ?????



--_000_AB3E6B5188566C488E011B9C54CF2A180618E1DD48satlrccdlmb60_
